def_en: A satellite is an object which has been sent into space in order to collect information or to be part of a communications system. Satellites move continually round the earth or around another planet.

def_cn: (电视)使用卫星技术的;卫视的
def_en: Satellite television is broadcast using a satellite.
A satellite is a natural object in space that moves round a planet or star.

def_cn: 卫星国;附属国;卫星区;卫星组织
def_en: You can refer to a country, area, or organization as a satellite when it is controlled by or depends on a larger and more powerful one.
